long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add humor and style to your Chrome tabs with Gintoki Sakata live wallpaper, featuring minimalist tools and a sleek design.

The Gintoki Sakata Gintama Live Wallpaper extension brings the beloved samurai of Gintama to your Chrome new tabs. Featuring a vibrant live wallpaper of Gintoki Sakata, this extension perfectly captures his laid-back yet quirky charm. Fans of the series will love the dynamic visuals, which breathe life into their browsing experience while paying homage to one of anime’s most iconic characters.

Designed for simplicity and usability, this extension includes a clean digital clock and a Google search bar, blending style with practicality. You can also add quick-access shortcuts to your favorite websites, making navigation effortless. Whether you’re revisiting Gintama’s hilarious antics or simply looking for a unique touch for your browser, this live wallpaper brings Gintoki’s world right to your screen with elegance and functionality.
